text: <@UKGV272KS> Thanks for your help and sharing information. But background Image is still not rendering in some environment such as outlook(in the test environment on the HubSpot It seems works, but at the reality reception, still there is a rendering problem - background Image is not rendered.)
I don’t know what “reception” refers to. Perhaps provide screenshots of what you’re seeing/not seeing?

Hello <@U0363PFA928>, as we discussed it is blocked by outlook and some other mail clients as they are not allowing img rendering. You can also check the checkbox 'block image rendering' on HubSpot email client test to simulate this. There is no way of displaying images if the client is not allowing that through security settings
VML is the only way to get background images to show in Outlook.
However if a user is blocking images, then there’s no way around that.
<@U029WCYHMDL> <@UKGV272KS> Ok, I see. Thanks for your sharing information.
